description: The Game Namerator is a fun app that instantly creates unique and imaginative titles for games. With a catalog of over 400 words to choose from, the Game Namerator is capable of creating over FIVE MILLION possible game names.  Example names created by the Game Namerator:   - Armor: The Precursor Species   - Warfare: Frontal Destroyer   - Hunted: A Pegasus Prototype  The Game Namerator features convenient copy functionality, allowing you to copy a game name to the clipboard and easily tweet, e-mail, or save the game name. If a game name contains a word that you want the Game Namerator to use more often, just tap the word to save it to a list of favorite words. Favorite words will frequently appear in each game name the Game Namerator creates.
